alert.note: Alert for Banner; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 24 at 8:40PM CST until November 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle Nebraska and southeast Wyoming. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick or snow covered road conditions and reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact post- holiday travel.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
